name: To Say Goodbye
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 50.
A 48-hour game jam in which only one person is required to make a game from scratch.

Originally supposed to be submitted for the Jam done in 72 hours, we started a day late and ended up part in the new Extra category, which takes 2 weeks.

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ]

Death is not as simple in this world.
As for those who cannot continue on with life any longer the Entity comes.

A sign that it's time to go.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement
    • WASD / Arrow Keys: Move around
    • Left Click: Parry
    • Right Click: Lighterang
    • Shift: Dash

CREDITS: 

  • @fiaKaiera – Team Leader, Art, & Co-Programmer
  • @chinoki346 – Main Programmer
  • noises.online - Background Sound
  • incompetech.com - ♫ Heartbreak

QUESTIONS: 

Q: Is the game supposed to be tedious, and monotonous?
A: Intentionally so, but we did try to make it much easier to be done for everyone. We tested a much more harder version than this (and played through it all) then toned it down while developing the game to what we think should be decent enough! Q: This is not enough! Is there a better challenge?!
A: [P]ress on than [R]est. (At this point, it's non-canon.)

If you have any questions, feel free to ask on my Twitter: @fiaKaiera
